dlc.title: DLC Coating

precision.title: ±0.001" Precision

edge.title: Superior Edge Bite
edge.description: Finer glide, confidence in turns, better stop response

hero.title: The Science of Performance
hero.subtitle: Diamond-Like Carbon coating changes the game

coating.title: DLC Nanoparticle Coating
coating.description: Our proprietary carbon nanoparticle coating delivers unmatched edge hardness and sharpness. The mirror finish creates superior glide while the coating prevents deburring during sharpening.

precision.title: Precision Manufacturing
precision.description: Each blade is crafted from verified stainless steel with profiling tolerance of ~0.001". This ensures perfect consistency between pairs for optimal balance and performance.

hero.title: Choose Your Style
hero.subtitle: Optimized for your position on ice

player.title: Player Blades
player.description: Engineered for agility and speed. The 10' radius provides the perfect balance between stability and maneuverability for forwards and defensemen.

goalie.title: Goalie Blades
goalie.description: Built for stability and lateral movement. The 30' radius maximizes ice contact for superior balance and push power.

guide.title: How to Measure
steps: Measure from toe to heel in millimeters

frequency.title: Sharpening Frequency
frequency.description: Thanks to the DLC coating, our blades require sharpening 50% less often than standard blades. Most players sharpen every 15-20 hours of ice time.

warranty.title: 1-Year Warranty
warranty.description: All JRZ Pro Black DLC blades come with a one-year warranty against manufacturing defects. This covers coating issues, structural integrity, and profile consistency.

returns.title: 30-Day Returns
returns.description: Not completely satisfied? Return unused blades within 30 days for a full refund. Blades must be in original condition with no mounting or sharpening marks.

shipping.title: Russia-wide Shipping
shipping.description: Free shipping throughout Russia. Standard delivery takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping available for an additional fee.

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: You will be redirected to secure YooKassa payment page
payment.methods: We accept cards, SberPay, Mir Pay, FPS

paid.title: Payment Received
paid.description: Your order #{orderId} has been successfully paid. We'll send a confirmation to your email.

pending.title: Processing Payment
pending.description: Your order #{orderId} is being processed. Please wait...

failed.title: Payment Failed
failed.description: Unfortunately, the payment was not completed. Please try again.

home.title: JRZ Pro Black DLC - Premium Hockey Blades with DLC Coating
